wikipedia_page.main: Peter Roy Edmunds is a British actor, photographer and artist based in London. He is best known for playing the series regular character of Peter, the Deputy Manager, in the ITV television comedy series Hotel Getaway.  His voice acting work is used in video games, commercials, documentaries, toys, films, audio books and television. In February 2018 he received 8 nominations, including Male Voiceover Artist of the Year, for the One Voice Awards 2018. In March 2019 he was nominated for Best Male Performance - Television Documentary Voiceover, at the One Voice Awards 2019. In March 2020 he received 4 nominations, including Male Voiceover Artist of the Year, for the One Voice Awards 2020.

response: * Pete Edmunds (born c. 1972), actor, voice actor, photographer, and artist
